sourcesContent:
import './App.css';
import { Flex, Input, Grid, Center, GridItem} from '@chakra-ui/react'
// import { ColorModeScript} from "@cha"
import NavBar from './components/navbar';
import DataContext from "./context/DataContext";
import { useContext } from 'react';


function App() {
  let {lightMode , toggleColorMode} = useContext(DataContext)
  return (
    <Flex w="100%" h="100svh"  justify="center" align="center" bg="white">
      <Flex  maxW="480px" w="100%" maxH="896px" h="100%" direction="column" >
        <NavBar/>
        <Flex direction="column" justify="space-between" h="100%">
          <Flex h="25%" >

          </Flex>
          <Flex h="60%" >
            <Flex w="75%" bg="#ebf0fa" borderTopLeftRadius="15px" >
              <Grid templateColumns='repeat(3, 1fr)' w="100%" gap="1rem" p="3%">
                <Center bg={lightMode?"#ccddfc":"white"} borderRadius="20px">1</Center>
                <Center bg={lightMode?"#ccddfc":"white"} borderRadius="20px">2</Center>
                <Center bg={lightMode?"#ccddfc":"white"} borderRadius="20px">3</Center>
                {/* <GridItem bg="white" h="100%" w="100%"/>
                <GridItem bg="white" h="100%" w="100%"/>
                <GridItem bg="white" h="100%" w="100%"/> */}
                <Center bg={lightMode?"#ccddfc":"white"} borderRadius="20px">4</Center>
                <Center bg={lightMode?"#ccddfc":"white"} borderRadius="20px">5</Center>
                <Center bg={lightMode?"#ccddfc":"white"} borderRadius="20px">6</Center>
                <Center bg={lightMode?"#ccddfc":"white"} borderRadius="20px">7</Center>
                <Center bg={lightMode?"#ccddfc":"white"} borderRadius="20px">8</Center>
                <Center bg={lightMode?"#ccddfc":"white"} borderRadius="20px">9</Center>
                <Center bg={lightMode?"#ccddfc":"white"} borderRadius="20px">0</Center>
                <Center bg={lightMode?"#ccddfc":"white"} borderRadius="20px">.</Center>
                <Center bg={lightMode?"#ccddfc":"white"} borderRadius="20px">/</Center>
              </Grid>
            </Flex>
            <Flex borderTopRightRadius="15px" w="25%" bg={lightMode?"#ebf0fa":"black"} gap="1rem" p="2%" direction="column" justify="space-evenly">
              {/* <Center bg="white" borderRadius="20px" h="20%">/</Center> */}
              <Center bg={lightMode?"#ffc2cd":""} borderRadius="20px" h="40%">/</Center>
              <Center bg="white" borderRadius="20px" h="40%">/</Center>
            </Flex>
          </Flex>
        </Flex>
      </Flex>
    </Flex>
  );
}

export default App;
